attributes.action: introduce night-only access to motorways for heavy goods vehicles and lorries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lorries continually dominate the near-side lanes and middle lanes of motorways forcing car drivers to overtake in the fast lane.  This causes accidents.  It would therefore make sense to only allow lorries and heavy goods vehicles onto motorways at night time when there is less ordinary traffic.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
